taxon_name.authority: Tuckerman ex Kükenthal in H. G. A. Engler

taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family cyperaceae;genus carex;section careyanae;species digitalis;variety digitalis

bio:treatment.description: Widest leaf 2.7–4.5(–5.3) mm wide. Inflorescence: longest peduncle of staminate spike 0.9–7.2(–11.4) cm; terminal spike usually surpassed by bract blade of distal lateral spike. Peryginia (8–)11–15-veined, 2.5–3.3 mm, apex barely excurved. 2n = 48.
Mesic to dry-mesic, deciduous or mixed deciduous-evergreen forests, mixed soils;
N.S., Ont., Que.; Ala., Ark., Conn., Del., D.C., Ga., Ill., Ind., Ky., Maine, Md., Mass., Mich., Mo., N.H., N.J., N.Y., N.C., Ohio, Okla., Pa., R.I., S.C., Tenn., Vt., Va., W.Va., Wis.
